content: stitch together with first stitch of next row place marker knit 16 k2tog k1 knit 1 round k1p1 twisted rib until over the end of your thumb be sure to pull the mitten all the way onto your hand as you test this cast off using your stretchy bind-off as for the hand repeat for second mitten point edwards mitts | fairlight fibers | fairlightfibers com point edwards mitts | fairlight fibers | fairlightfibers com point edwards mitts | fairlight fibers | fairlightfibers com
